objective: Find all family offices and fund of funds (FoF) investment firms in the United States

match_conditions.name: family_office_or_fof_type
match_conditions.description: Company must be a family office, fund of funds, or multi-manager investment firm. Look for keywords: 'family office', 'fund of funds', 'FoF', 'multi-manager', 'investment office'. Exclude single-strategy funds and individual investment advisors.

match_conditions.name: us_location
match_conditions.description: Company headquarters must be in the United States. Look for location information in company descriptions, LinkedIn pages, contact pages, or address information.
